channel.title: Artifical Intelligence on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: AI Isn’t Hollywood’s First Script Doctor. But It May Be Its Last
item.description: Invisible labor has long powered Hollywood, from blacklisted writers to uncredited directors. But the rise of AI threatens to erase authorship entirely.

item.title: Universal Music Group Increasing Efforts on Music AI Patents
item.description: UMG said it’s filed for 15 patents through the partnership already, including one related to AI threat protection.
